metadata.dc:author: Ochoa Flores, L
Vázquez Guerrero, V
Sánchez Prieto, M
Hernández, M J
Moreno Vélez, R
Silva Romo, E
metadata.dc:description: A study exposing the situation affecting the population of San Luis Potosí in central México, caused by dental fluorosis. Findings point to the need of implementing devices capable of regulating the concentrations of Fluorine ion (generating the efficient prevention of dental cavity incidence), to maintain them at optimal levels and without deletereal effects.
metadata.dc:title: Fluorosis dental en San Luis Potosí y sus alternativas de solución. (Estudio piloto).
[Dental fluorosis in San Luis Potosi and its solution alternatives (pilot study)].
